overview:
Spark Hire is a video job board and online interviewing platform where job seekers can easily connect with companies looking to hire.

Spark Hire enriches interaction between job seekers and companies by integrating a cloud-based video platform with online job board features. Spark Hire’s platform was developed in response to the frustration that job seekers and companies are experiencing with the traditional online job market.

Job seekers are frustrated with the traditional online job market as it continues to rely upon old-fashioned resumes and cover letters as the primary, if not sole, measure of an applicant’s professional attributes. Spark Hire provides a way for job seekers to present themselves to companies more completely than a resume ever could. With the ability to record a 60 second Profile Video as an enhancement to their resume, job seekers can demonstrate their creativity, candor and communication skills when applying for jobs. Upon opening an application, employers can view Profile Videos and determine if an applicant demonstrates the characteristics and skills they are looking for in their next hire.

Companies are frustrated with the time consuming and expensive efforts associated with finding a new hire. Expensive job posts, hours of screening applicants, and the headaches associated with scheduling interviews have companies looking for a better way. Spark Hire provides companies with an all encompassing solution for streamlining the talent acquisition process. With Spark Hire, companies qualify candidates by viewing their Profiles and self directed Profile Videos. They can even conduct video interviews by sending a candidate a series of questions and receiving back video recorded answers. This saves companies time and money as they are able to quickly shift through many layers of job applications without going through phone and first round interviews. Lastly, companies can connect face-to-face with top prospects in an online interview from the convenience of their own computer.

Spark Hire is sparking to life the new generation of online job boards for everyone.
